389990.name: Blues and Bullets - Original Soundtrack
389990.description:
蓝调子弹的原声曲目囊括了一系列扣人心弦的音乐，将你带回那个黑暗与神秘交织的桑塔埃斯佩兰萨。

所有曲目都是MP3格式。

  • Blues And Bullets ft Izä
  • Main Theme
  • Investigation
  • Capone’s Mansion
  • O.B.
  • The Guest
  • Delphine
  • Nikolai Ivankov
  • Submarine
  • Chapel
  • Reconstruction
  • Blues And Bullets Intimate (Jukebox)
  • Lost Children
  • The Diner
  • Garrison, O’Reilly, Di Pietro, Dockers
  • Entrance Cleared
  • Capone
  • Meeting Delphine
  • Submarine Emersion
  • Confess your sins

曲目都会通过Steam下载路径存在蓝调子弹的文件夹中：
..\Steam\steamapps\common\Blues and Bullets
